alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 8:47PM PST until February 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations between 8 and 15 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should expect winter driving conditions through at least early Monday morning over Stevens Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow will increase this evening into the overnight. Local patches of freezing rain are possible Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
